directions: Spread mussels in a 13- by 9-inch baking dish. Blend all remaining ingredients to a paste in a food processor. Spoon mixture over mussels. Cover tightly with foil and bake in middle of oven until all mussels are open, 12 to 15 minutes. (Discard any unopened mussels.)
ingredients: 2 lb mussels (preferably cultivated), cleaned and beards removed
1/2 stick unsalted butter, cut into pieces
title: Mussels with Parsley and Garlic
